00037         public static $passedTests = array();

00045         public static $remainingTests = array();

00117         public static function runHook($hook, $subtest = false) {
00118                 
00119                 if($subtest) self::$currentTest['subtest'] = $hook;
00120                 else self::$currentTest['test'] = $hook;
00121                 
00122                 static::$hook();
00123                 
00124                 if($subtest) self::$currentTest['subtest'] = 'none';
00125                 else self::$currentTest['test'] = 'none';
00126                 
00127         }

00135         public static function runTests() {
00136                 
00137                 set_exception_handler(array(get_called_class(), 'handleException'));
00138                 
00139                 echo '<head><title>' . get_called_class() . '</title></head>';
00140                 
00141                 // Find our tests.
00142                 self::findTests();
00143                 
00144                 // Call the preTesting hook.
00145                 static::runHook('preTesting');
00146                 
00147                 // Start looping while there's tests to be done!
00148                 while(self::$remainingTests != array()) {
00149                         // Keep the old array of passed tests for checking we're not stuck in a loop.
00150                         $check = self::$passedTests;
00151                         
00152                         foreach(self::$remainingTests as $test) {
00153                                 $test = self::$tests[$test];
00154                                 
00155                                 // Check if the prerequisites have passed.
00156                                 if(array_diff($test->dependencies, self::$passedTests) != array()) continue;
00157                                 else self::$currentTest['test'] = (string)$test;
00158                                 
00159                                 echo "<b>$test</b>";
00160                                 
00161                                 // Run the preTest hook.
00162                                 static::runHook('preTest', true);
00163                                 
00164                                 // And the test
00165                                 $test->run();
00166                                 
00167                                 // And the postTest hook...
00168                                 static::runHook('postTest', true);
00169                                 
00170                                 // Everything went smoothly, update the various arrays.
00171                                 self::$passedTests[] = (string)$test;
00172                                 self::$remainingTests = array_diff(
00173                                         array_map(function($test) { return (string)$test; }, self::$tests),
00174                                         self::$passedTests);
00175                         }
00176                         
00177                         // Check that at least one test has passed, otherwise we're caught in a loop.
00178                         if(self::$passedTests == $check) throw new MVCException('Unable to complete testing, this is likely due to an invalid dependency configuration.  Please ensure your dependency tests actually exist and there are no circular dependencies.  Test remaining: ' . implode(', ', self::$remainingTests) . '.');
00179                 }
00180                 
00181                 // Do any final stuff.
00182                 static::runHook('postTesting');
00183                 
00184         }
00185         
00192         protected static function findTests() {
00193                 
00194                 // Scan the current directory for a list of test files...
00195                 $testFiles = array_filter(scandir('.'), function($file) {
00196                         if(substr($file, -9) == '_test.php' and is_file($file)) return true;
00197                         else return false;
00198                 });
00199                 sort($testFiles); // Reset the indexing.
00200                 
00201                 // Create an array of tests names from that...
00202                 foreach($testFiles as $file) {
00203                         require_once $file;
00204                         
00205                         $name = Inflector::camelize(substr($file,0,-4));
00206                         $class = "$name\\$name";
00207                         
00208                         if(!class_exists($class, false)) throw new MVCException("Could not load test '$name' for file '$file'.  Please ensure your test is named correctly and in the correct namespace.");
00209                         self::$tests[$name] = new $class;
00210                         self::$remainingTests[] = (string)self::$tests[$name];
00211                         if(!(self::$tests[$name] instanceof UnitTest)) throw new MVCException('Tests must extend UnitTest to be compatible with TestSuite.');
00212                 }
00213                 
00214         }

00223         public static function assertTrue($value) {
00224                 
00225                 if($value !== true) throw new TestFailedException('true', $value);

00277         public static function handleException($exception) {
00278                 
00279                 if($exception instanceof MVCException) echo $exception->getFormattedMsg();
00280                 else echo str_replace("\n", '<br />', $exception->getMessage());
00281                 $class = static::$currentTest['test'];
00282                 $class = "$class\\$class";
00283                 if(class_exists($class,false) and static::$ensurePostTesting) {
00284                         static::runHook('postTest');
00285                         static::runHook('postTesting');
00286                 }
00287                 exit;
00288                 
00289         }

00310                 var_dump($value);
00311                 return '<div style="padding: 10px;border: 1px solid #666;background-color: #eee">' . ob_get_clean() . '</div>';

00324         public function __construct($type, $value1, $value2 = '') {
00325                 
00326                 // Print a line saying the test failed.
00327                 echo '<li>' . TestSuite::$currentTest['subtest'] . ' <span style="color: red">failed</span>.</li></ul>';
00328                 
00329                 // Set the message.
00330                 $trace = $this->getTrace();
00331                 $this->message = TestSuite::$currentTest['test'] . '::' . TestSuite::$currentTest['subtest'] . ' failed: ' . Inflector::variablize("assert_$type") . " (line {$trace[1]['line']}) - ";
00332                 $value1 = $this->getPrintable($value1);
00333                 $value2 = $this->getPrintable($value2);
00334                 switch($type) {
00335                         case 'strict':
00336                                 $this->message .= "$value1 <b>not strictly equal</b> $value2";
00337                                 break;
00338                         case 'equal':
00339                                 $this->message .= "$value1 <b>not equal</b> $value2";
00340                                 break;
00341                         case 'true':
00342                                 $this->message .= "$value1 <b>not strictly true</b>";
00343                                 break;
00344                         case 'false':
00345                                 $this->message .= "$value1 <b>not strictly false</b>";
00346                                 break;
00347                 }
00348                 
00349         }
